category: Objects with Primary Rotational or Spinning Functions
explanation: Record Player, Ferris Wheel, Washing Machine, and Blender all rely on a central rotating or spinning mechanism for their primary operation. A book does not share this functional characteristic.

category: The Seven Wonders of the Ancient World
explanation: The first four are universally recognized as part of the original Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. Chichén Itzá is one of the New7Wonders of the World, designated in 2007, and was not part of the original ancient list compiled by Hellenic travelers.
The first four words each contain the name of a planet (Saturn, Mars, Jupiter, Mercury) as a substring. 'SunFLOWER' does not contain a planet name.
